data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I am going to be late for dinner tonight. The ____ day ____ ends ____ five ____ the ____. But ____, ____ have a lot ____ work ____ to ____. I will be home at six or seven P.M. Don't wait for me to eat dinner!
data.partBlankContent: I am going to be late for dinner tonight. The busi____ day of___ ends a_ five i_ the eve____. But ton____, w_ have a lot o_ work le__ to d_. I will be home at six or seven P.M. Don't wait for me to eat dinner!
data.fullContent: I am going to be late for dinner tonight. The business day often ends at five in the evening. But tonight, we have a lot of work left to do. I will be home at six or seven P.M. Don't wait for me to eat dinner!
data.answer: 今晚吃饭我要迟到了。工作日通常在晚上五点结束。但是今晚，我们还有很多工作要做。我将在下午六七点到家，不要等我吃晚饭!
